short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An elegant New Tab for developers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
用一个简单优雅的页面替代新窗口。
拥有时间、定位、任务清单、定制导航和搜索接口等功能。
未来还会不断优化，拓展新功能，敬请期待！

Replace new Tab page with an elegant page which has several functions include clock, geolocation, todo-list, customized Favorite list, .etc.
The App will be optimized continuously, you can look forward to it!

Changelog:
version 1.0.1: add import, export data with JSON file, add weather forecast.
version 1.0.1: sortable todoItems, cancel weather plugin for now.
